website_summaries.verdict: A budget conscious choice that   delivers natural-looking separation, intriguing texture and medium hold. A little goes a long way.
pros: Dry spray wax that provides medium hold and shine
Adds body and texture, especially in shorter, textured hair
Helps to control flyaways and create separation
cons: A good choice for thick-haired customers, but those with straight, fine hair may want to look elsewhere

customer_reviews.title: Great hold!
customer_reviews.text: Works great BUT if you have fine hair like I do, spray it on your hands then rub it where you want it otherwise if you spray it directly on your roots your hair becomes too sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Gibson

customer_reviews.title: The best product for Short Layered Hair
customer_reviews.text: I love it, love it, love it! I have short layered hair and I've been looking for something that isn't going to feel like a hair spray, and not a gel but will do get my hair a bit tougher, almost like a mouse but that you don't have to touch with your hands and or apply to your hair (I hate touching things with my hands). This hair sprayable wax is amazing, totally changed my way of doing my hair, smells really nice, holds my hair very nicely and honestly the best thing I can recommend for the short layered hair. I've purchased two bottles already, I love it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, great texture, no sticky stiffness
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a cheaper alternative to my salon’s styling wax, preferably one that didn’t leave my hair stiff or sticky. This product is great for texturing and styling my pixie cut. It keeps my hair in place, gives it a nice edgy look, and keeps it soft and full of life. It smells pretty good too! I’ll definitely be using this over my expensive wax. Cheap beauty finds for the win!
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: The hold is excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Redken WaxBlast 10 for a long time. When the price kept going up, I thought I should give another product a try. This is half the price and works just as well as the WaxBlast. I have hair that wants to lay flat and I like a little body in my hair. It lasts all day. I will definitely continue using this product.
customer_reviews.author: c.g.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Works well for styling pixie cut
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time buying this brand of dry wax spray, and I am not disappointed. I usually use the KMS California brand, but I ran out and the stores don't have it/ it wouldn't have been delivered when I needed it. So I ordered this brand and it works well! I don't like the scent as much as the other brand I normally use, but the product does what it is supposed to do. I will probably order this again since the price is good.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: For touchable hair. Adds volume too.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is essential to big hair do's. I use it instead of traditional hairspray and my hair can go days without shampooing because it doens turn into stiff helmet hair. The fragrance is like my fav perfume. sometimes I just use that and get comments "Love your perfume" ha ha
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Essential for great volume and style!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my all time favorite hair products. When your hair is fine and won't stay put, or has no body...this is the product you need. Just a little goes a long way and don't spray on the roots.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Braid Wax
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a solution to keep my fine hair from slipping out of braids. I saw a youtube tutorial with a british lady braiding a toddler's superfine hair with this stuff and had to try it. It works AMAZING as braid wax. My french/dutch/corona braids now last all day and night, and the waves aren't crunchy when the braid comes out. Also helpful to slick down flyaways at the crown and has a nice shine too.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Quammen

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! I use it on my 6 y/o daughters hair for school every day. The smell is awesome and lays all those flyaways down for a smooth look. It doesn’t make her hair look greasy and I use it every day and wash her hair probably every 3-4 days
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I have very thin hair and too much product can weigh it down quickly but this hairspray is perfect. It smells amazing and gives me moveable hold that doesn't leave my hair stiff and dry looking. A
customer_reviews.author: N. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy for my hair
customer_reviews.text: Too heavy for my hair. Hold isn’t great. Seems to weigh the hair down. My hair is fine and not a lot of it.
customer_reviews.author: MRS3

customer_reviews.title: Indispensable product for beachy-looking hairstyles
customer_reviews.text: Great product as an intermediate (or final) layer for holding curl and creating fun texture. It's stiff, but not too stiff. Can hold a style for a few days without looking like its been a few days. "I woke up like this" comes to mind.
customer_reviews.author: m k short

customer_reviews.title: Made my fine hair too greasy.
customer_reviews.text: I experimented to see if I could find a quantity that would work with my hair but each time my hair was either unaffected (not enough) or greasy and weighed down. I have chin-length fine hair that's "normal"--not oily or dry. This stuff just overwhelmed my hair.
customer_reviews.author: NolaForever

customer_reviews.title: Magically Thicken Your Hair
customer_reviews.text: If you have Thin unmanageable hair, this is your magic product! Until I found this, I didn't know how or what to do with my hair!! This, Spray a tiny amount, push, pull and fluff your fingers through your hair and Style! Voila! You're Done!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Adams

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was hoping for!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I had been looking for “dirty wax” in a spray and this is the one that works the best! Other products are gooey and weight your hair down. This one is light, gives excellent definition or texture and the scent is really great. This is a light spray that goes where you put it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Works Great but Strong Scent
customer_reviews.text: Cosmetologist used this on my hair after a cut. I liked the texture it adds to my hair so I purchased it from Amazon as a bit cheaper. Product works but smell is strong and the longer I use it, the more irritated my scalp has become.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Ferris

customer_reviews.title: Very sticky.
customer_reviews.text: This product left my hair sticky and flat. It's likely that I didn't use it correctly, however I followed directions. I had to quickly re-wash the product out of my hair and re-style before I left for an appointment.
customer_reviews.author: RoswellGirl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product for that "piecy textured" look!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for over ten years now, it's awesome. I shop around for the best price because salons are very expensive. I'd recommend this to anyone who uses other hair wax products on the market. it's my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eh. Wouldn't buy again for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. I prefer Paul Mitchell spray wax. This doesn't add much workability or texture. I'd would describe as more of a mild texturizer, good for a second day feel. Doesn't add volume or styling.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: It separates and holds!
customer_reviews.text: I have short, thick, layered hair and I could not get any product to hold a chunky, separated looking style for a whole day. This does it. I love it. Work with it as to how much you need to get the look you want. I use a hefty amount to get the look I want. It’s very “touchable” all day, unlike a lot of clay products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the Same
customer_reviews.text: Sexy Hair has replaced their “Piece Out” product with this and the hold doesn’t even come close to “Piece Out”
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can’t live without- baby fine hair
customer_reviews.text: Love this- adds texture without weight. Fine spray so you can spray it on fingertips for root-only application. Mist over hair after curling, smooth the strays fluff and go. Can’t live without it.
customer_reviews.author: DM Miller

customer_reviews.title: Thick and dirty texture
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! I’m always looking for a great texturizer and thickener for my long coarse Asian hair. This is similar to Redken’s WaxBlast and IGK’s Down and Out Dirty Spray. I will definitely buy this again!!
customer_reviews.author: Momo

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have super short, super fine hair. With this spray it thickens it up and keeps it in place without weighing it down or making me use another product to keep the hold. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: F.E. ArlissTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: tame fly aways and add texture
customer_reviews.text: this is great to tame frizzy fly aways while adding some texture to freshly washed hair. love this product!
customer_reviews.author: kimberly Grant

customer_reviews.title: Makes a DIY bad haircut look good!
customer_reviews.text: I have a short layered pixie that I've been cutting myself (covid!) and not doing such a good job. This stuff lightly sprayed and then fluffed makes it look like a great cut!
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy

customer_reviews.title: Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite hair styling product. It gives your hair shape without that coated feeling. It adds texture so that your hair looks so natural. I am a diva about the products I use. I buy this in bulk when it's on sale and I store it in every bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: C. Nagel

customer_reviews.title: Don’t over spray . Use just a little.
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice. Tends to weigh my hair down if I spray too much.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Really Last
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I love the small of this product. That's half the reason I keep using it. It does give hair a bit of texture at first, but it quickly falls out. Maybe I don't know what I'm doing, but I haven't had much luck with it.
customer_reviews.author: RZK

customer_reviews.title: The best spray clay.
customer_reviews.text: There isn't a better product on the market place. Less is more. Use the least amount you can to achieve your style. Worth the money. Use with a light finish of good hairspray.
customer_reviews.author: 7th Child

customer_reviews.title: Impressive.
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell. I appreciate the strength of the spray--I don't need to use much. Its creates a natural look and holds strong throughout the day. Impressive product.
customer_reviews.author: Liberty Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Omg love the smell and shine
customer_reviews.text: No crunchy feeling after using the product gives shine and nice texture. Will purchase again ! Oh and the smell is amazing...
customer_reviews.author: B2017

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the messy look
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even know there was a Wax Spray hair product until my hairdresser used it on me in the salon. I had to ask what it was and when she told me, I found it here on Amazon and bought it the same day! I have a short, pixie-style haircut that I love to spike up and make messy. This is such a fun product to do that with... and it smells great! My hair looks shiny and spunky, but not greasy; very Rock Star.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great product and smells so good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I noticed that it’s what my stylist uses. It smells SO good! And I love the texture it gives my hair. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: stephen sutton

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! It makes my hair manageable with a shiny glow. I have fine, wavy hair and this helps me get it looking the way I want. I'm addicted!
customer_reviews.author: Onlineordererextrodinare

customer_reviews.title: Faulty nozzle
customer_reviews.text: Nozzle came off and can’t get back on without spraying everywhere
customer_reviews.author: DEB LUCAS

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was cheaper than what I've been paying locally, I was shocked. Delivery was right on time, packaging was great.
customer_reviews.author: Renee A. Waring

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy
customer_reviews.text: I mostly use this to fix my hair when my hair isn't following orders, but it is a quick (slightly greasy) spray fix to that issue. Doesn't dry as dry looking as I would have hoped, but it is perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Hilton

customer_reviews.title: Love this for my short pixi cut
customer_reviews.text: I ran out of my usual product and could not find it anywhere. I took a chance on this. I LOVE it! I have a really short pixi cut and it gives me the ability to play with the look without getting greasy looking and has a really good hold. I will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Amy C.

customer_reviews.title: not what I thought
customer_reviews.text: I live in Louisiana and my hair frizzes. I previously bought some "air wax" to put on the ends. My hair is oily and fine, so most products leave it greasy. Maybe I don't know how to use this product, but it doesn't help the frizz & certainly doesn't add volume.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pixie Hair
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great, I just blow dry my hair, spray this stuff in, and my hair looks great. Super light with a medium hold. Only have to use another product if my hair isn’t behaving
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for natural curl! Not heavy and doesn't leave hair with a crunchy texture. Hair is touchable but holds all day !
customer_reviews.author: dianne l. vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: This leaves my hair feeling dirty, not in a Day 2 type of dirty, but rather in a Day 18, icky kind of dirty. It does give a medium hold, and the fragrance is tolerable (coconut), and it does give a messy look to the hair, but the feel? Just ick. I much prefer Redken Spray wax. It gives the same end result, except that my hair does NOT feel icky. It is similarly priced to the Sexy Hair Play Dirty Dry Wax spray so I think from now on I will go back to the tried and true Redken product.
customer_reviews.author: riley

customer_reviews.title: Dirty
customer_reviews.text: When they say “play dirty” they mean it. That’s how this makes your hair feel, dirty. Maybe it’s my fault for not taking the label more literally.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Davis

customer_reviews.title: Looking for a different product but this one is a great substitute.
customer_reviews.text: I can't find Short Sexy Hair Shatter anywhere! I saw this product and gave it a try, I really do love it. It gave me great texture without being stiff and sticky. Easy to use and smells great, too.
customer_reviews.author: smiley edna

customer_reviews.title: Makes hair look oily
customer_reviews.text: It makes my hair look dirty. Wanted something that separated hair for a textured, sculpted look-- but instead it just looks oily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: So happy to find this product. Holds hair but is also flexible. Good value
customer_reviews.author: mdonovan48

customer_reviews.title: It’s not a full size bottle! But love the product!
customer_reviews.text: It was a little smaller than I expected but I probably just didn’t read the details. Love the product regardless!
customer_reviews.author: Andria Juarez

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this product...a little to “dirty” for my taste & I think you are supposed to use it on dry hair & I like spray wax on wet hair.
customer_reviews.author: Shooda

customer_reviews.title: I have really thin fine hair and this really adds some texture for me
customer_reviews.text: Works really well for me, I have really thin fine hair and this really adds some texture for me. A little bit really does go a long way, I say add a small amount because you can always add more!
customer_reviews.author: MaylynnTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great product, outstanding value.
customer_reviews.text: Spray wax gives a much more natural look than other spray products. It gives hold while staying mailable. This one smells great and delivers a strong hold. Other spray waxes are a bit lighter, but this does the trick and it's not too waxy. For the price, this is the best product.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Paul Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Worked well but needed to be removed from here up on sleep
customer_reviews.text: Worked well but needed to be removed from here up on sleep
customer_reviews.author: kek

customer_reviews.title: Great hair spray
customer_reviews.text: Hair soft and pliable but stays in place. A winner!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This spray wax is awesome. I've used it for some time now and prefer it over other products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this one to try after using another popular brand of similar quality and like it. It gives my hair a nice texture, scent, and holds my style. I have short hair and it works well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Gangler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for flyaway hair
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for months and preferred to the wax in the can.
customer_reviews.author: Patty  B.  Miami

customer_reviews.title: Did the exact opposite of the description
customer_reviews.text: This makes my hair look horrible! Not only does it not hold my messy hair ends up, it makes my hair look greasy. Back to Chi spray wax for me.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Moore

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Pricey and small..Wife said savings it for hard times haha..But she likes it..
customer_reviews.author: G Pope

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS STUFF!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is $20 at the salon and when I came across this on Amazon for half the prize I knew I had to get it. Once I received it, it smelt the same and the size of the bottle is the same. This stuff is really good for when you have layers and you want it to be noticed.
customer_reviews.author: Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: texture heaven
customer_reviews.text: i love this product. it gives hair texture just like it promises but without any kind of sticky residue.
customer_reviews.author: cassandra b.

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever for my short hair!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this spray wax. It only takes a little and it's so easy to style my hair now! If they ever quit making this product, I will go nuts! ; )
customer_reviews.author: KC24

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Good Stuff!! Great price compared to all of the others that I have tried or priced...works just as well as the mid $20 versions.
customer_reviews.author: Penn33State

customer_reviews.title: Great as a finishing spray
customer_reviews.text: I have fine hair that gets all whispy after I blow dry and straighten it. Now when I'm done styling I hit it with this all over. It's not hairspray, it creates this non-frizzy finish. Gives hair that is smooth and slippy.
customer_reviews.author: Pros

customer_reviews.title: Play Dirty hair volumnizer
customer_reviews.text: Best stuff ever! I have short fine hair and this helps add volumn and control even after bed Head every morning. Not sticky
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Judy
customer_reviews.text: REally good. Did not disappoint. Flexible. Smells nice. Leaves hair in place but malleable. You can reshape it anyway you want. Not stiff at all. Feels really soft yet holds you style. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: I need stronger hold for my pixie hair cut. ...
customer_reviews.text: I need stronger hold for my pixie hair cut....my hair is straight and thin and limp. This works. I can use it on dry hair, spray it, fluff it and go.
customer_reviews.author: Constance Rinaldi

customer_reviews.title: Would not reorder.
customer_reviews.text: This seemed to make my hair lose volume and made my hair look kinda greasy.
customer_reviews.author: ruapeper

customer_reviews.title: This would have been great if I lived in the 50s and were going ...
customer_reviews.text: It just greased my hair and didn’t really have any hold. This would have been great if I lived in the 50s and were going down to my local soda fountain.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Porter

customer_reviews.title: Smells awful ☹️
customer_reviews.text: Can't stand the smell! It is super strong and doesn't go away. It would be ok if it didn't have such an overpowering scent.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spray
customer_reviews.text: I personally like to use a spray rather than paste.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen DesRosiers

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this spray! Works great to hold my hair but not heavy!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Steenblock

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent. Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and recommend it all the time
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: If you don't have the hour to wash and prep at night, use this in the morning!
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves this product. It takes a total of over an hour to wash, dry and prep her hair so she's not able to do it every day. Instead she uses this if she didn't get to wash it the night before. Come out looking beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Nykerz

customer_reviews.title: Gives texture with medium hold
customer_reviews.text: I use this product like a finishing spray. It gives texture and holds my curl without being sticky or crusty.
customer_reviews.author: Emili Niles

customer_reviews.title: It worked! I go for five days without washing my hair now and it still looks good
customer_reviews.text: This definitely gives your hair the fullness you’re looking for.
customer_reviews.author: crystalcoast

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like
customer_reviews.text: I didnt like it. It leaves my hair very greasy and no hold to it at all
customer_reviews.author: Mellissa Butler

customer_reviews.title: Best product for your hair
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product. I have very thin hair and this works well.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Not for fine hair
customer_reviews.text: I've tried using this so many times and it just makes my fine hair feel waxy and dirty. It doesn't matter how much I use it just feels gross on my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Provides superb definition
customer_reviews.text: Love this wax spray. It gives short hair definition and texture.
customer_reviews.author: Genise Denton

customer_reviews.title: Makes my hair greasy
customer_reviews.text: This dry wax is not for everyone. I have beautiful long hair but it's fine. This product has done nothing but make it look greasy, no matter how little of it I use. To a point where I've had to use dry shampoo on top of it. A complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Somze

customer_reviews.title: This product changed my hair life !
customer_reviews.text: Best wax product I’ve ever used ! Doesn’t leave my hair sticky like others leaves a very pleasant odor. Washes out easily. Fantastic for super curly hair. This product changed my hair life !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I saw a YouTuber use this on her short hair and had to try it. Glad I did! It gives my hair body, texture and shine.
customer_reviews.author: RLMS

customer_reviews.title: IT DOESNT ADD BODY IT JUST MAKES IT FEEL AND LOOK VERY DIRTY.
customer_reviews.text: THIS DIDNT SEEMTO LIFT MY ROOTS AS I HOPED . IT GIVES MY HAIR A VERY GROSS TEXTURE. IT DOESNT ADD BODY IT JUST MAKES IT FEEL AND LOOK VERY DIRTY.
customer_reviews.author: Alycia Michelove

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: What a great product for a fraction of the price of the salons.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Short Hair Must Have
customer_reviews.text: I have short hair and I like it to look funky and modern. I absolutely love this product as it is extremely easy to apply and mold my hair into the shape I want. Whether I want to look soft or punky, this product can do it all with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... this on my hair at the salon and I liked the results so now I use it all the ...
customer_reviews.text: Stylist used this on my hair at the salon and I liked the results so now I use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Kara mia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beyond amazing. .recommend this..got from my stylist. .its Awesome. U definitely will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelynn Eagerton Myers

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't really hold in place so well which is what ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't really hold in place so well which is what I'd hoped for. I ruffle my short hair to make a piecing effect but it ends up falling flat after only a short while.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Double check the shine/hold
customer_reviews.text: The title of this product is misleading. My fault for not being more thorough. I wanted “spray clay”. Product is sticky and greasy. And looking at the product title, I thought I was buying the right thing. Didn’t know there were different kinds with this brand. Boop.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice wax spray for that hairstyle , where you don't want stiff hair like from hairspray.
customer_reviews.author: J. S.

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: Not the worst but not the best. Smells like a rejected bath and body works perfume
customer_reviews.author: Andrea L.

customer_reviews.title: My hair was wet after I used it and it doesn't smell too good.
customer_reviews.text: My hair was wet and sticky after I used it ,then I can't send it back as you can't send spray products back...Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: charles wilf

customer_reviews.title: Spray itself is fine, but it smells rotten
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these and while they work well, they smell awful. Sort of a rancid smell. Perhaps I got old product, because I can't understand why anyone would buy it if it's supposed to smell like that. I used to use Paul Mitchell which smelled GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: cmykla

customer_reviews.title: Dry Wax Spray
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't give me quite the texture and piecing I had hoped for. Smells great and does and okay job. Still looking for the right texturizing spray.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Frederickson

customer_reviews.title: ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Awesome to use on short, just washed hair! Gives that two-three day unwashed hair texture!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole LaFrance

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to add some texture and keep hair in place. Three girls in my house and we are fans.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Ann Wagner

customer_reviews.title: I didn't like the waxy feel
customer_reviews.text: My hair is short but I found it just weighed it down. I didn't like the waxy feel. Wish I could send it back. It had good reviews is why I bought it. It might work for a man's short hair or super short hair.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY AWESOME PRODUCT FOR AMAZING HAIR RESULTS!!
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS PRODUCT!! HOLDS GREAT, WITHOUT THE HARD TEXTURE LIKE HAIRSPRAY
customer_reviews.author: ASHLEY

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this dry wax spray! So easy to use and really shapes hair just right. This is my 2nd bottle and I will continue using as long as it is available.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Masucci

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I hate the oily surface it puts in my hair. It does hold good however. Just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy 14

product_meta.title: SexyHair Style Play Dirty Dry Wax Spray, 4.8 oz
product_meta.description:
Play Dirty Dry Wax Spray helps shape hair by giving it texture, dimension and separation with the control of a hair styling wax and the convenience of a styling spray. Play Dirty Wax Spray has a medium hold and shine. Add body, dimension and texture to any hair type with this versatile hair styling wax for men or women's hairstyles. Spray this dry hair wax to give your hair added texture, hold, and easily play with dimension and style. Style Sexy Hair gives you control over the texture and hold of your hair for your perfect, sexy look. Style Sexy Hair products help you create your favorite look, texture, and hold. Choose from a full range of styling products, including hair texture cream, hair gel for men and women, and hair styling wax from SEXYHAIR. SEXYHAIR is loved by professionals and best known for our big red can of hairspray. We are a Leading Professional Hairspray Brand. We also have a full line of both styling and hair care products to suit the need of most hair types.

BRAND STORY
Sexy Hair was created in Los Angeles, CA in 1998 and is now a global brand in over 60 countries. Although best known for its big red can of hairspray, Sexy Hair has a full line of care and styling products for every hair type.
